resources.string: I scored %d points in the Math Game!

The goal of the game is to practice addition and subtraction of single-digit numbers. The game starts with a randomly generated math problem displayed on the screen. Enter your answer in the provided input field and press the Submit button to confirm your answer. If your answer is correct, you will earn points and a new math operation will be displayed. If the answer is incorrect, you will lose points and a new math operation will be displayed. Throughout the game, your current score, the number of remaining lives, and the time left to input the answer will be tracked. The game ends when you lose all lives or solve the given number of problems. At the end of the game, your final score will be displayed along with options to play again or return to the start screen. If you wish to share your score with friends, you can use the share button in the app. Good luck and enjoy the game!
